targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCInOctets"), 1s) *8 FROM "ports" WHERE ("switch" = 'nocgw' AND "interface" = 'xe-0/1/3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(“value”) AS “traffic_in” FROM “interface.traffic” WHERE “host” = ‘MyHost’ AND “namecache” =~ /Traffic - 1/0/15/ AND “type” = ‘traffic_in’ AND timeFilter GROUP BY time(__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(“value”) AS “traffic_in” FROM “interface.traffic” WHERE “host” = ‘MyHost’ AND “namecache” =~ /Traffic - 1/0/15/ AND “type” = ‘traffic_in’ AND timeFilter GROUP BY time(__interval) fill(none)

targets.rawSql: select count(distinct data->>'clientmac') from metrics WHERE time > NOW() - INTERVAL '15 minutes';
